info.title: Ticket Inventory API
info.description: API for managing event tickets: reservations, purchases, and transfers

tags.name: Ticket Management
tags.description: APIs for managing event tickets and reservations

post.description: Reserve multiple seats for an event. Seats will be held for 10 minutes. All seats must be available for the reservation to succeed.

patch.description: Cancel all reserved (unpaid) tickets for an event. Returns list of affected payment intents.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the event to cancel tickets for

patch.summary: Update ticket preference for split booking
patch.description: Updates on user preference whether they wish to keep their ticket upon failure of full party payment. Changes only the specified ticket preference to either keep or refund.
Transfer a purchased ticket to another user. Only the current ticket owner can initiate the transfer.

requestBody.description: Transfer details including current and new owner information

patch.description: Release previously reserved seats back to available status
Confirms a ticket reservation after successful payment. Changes ticket status from reserved to sold.

400.description: Invalid reservation or tickets no longer reserved

patch.summary: Confirm ticket purchase for split booking
patch.description: Confirms a specific ticket reservation after successful payment. Changes only the specified ticket status from reserved to sold.
To cancel ticket(s) after party booking failed for those who choose for refund.

get.description: Retrieves all tickets and their current status for a specific event. Includes availability, pricing, and category information.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the event to get tickets for

get.description: Retrieve tickets associated with a specific user

get.summary: Get all tickets associated with a user
get.description: Retrieves all tickets where the given user is either the current owner or the previous owner.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID to retrieve associated tickets

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific ticket, including payment data

parameters.name: ticket_id
parameters.description: ID of the ticket to retrieve

userId.description: ID of the user making the reservation

seats.description: List of seat numbers to reserve

items.description: List of seat numbers to reserve

CategoryPrice.description: Price information for a ticket category

CreateTicketsRequest.description: Request for creating tickets with events and category prices

seats.description: List of seats for the event

message.example: Successfully canceled 5 sold tickets for event ID: 8

ticketId.description: ID of the ticket to update preference

PreferenceRequest.description: Request object for updating ticket preference

UpdatePreferenceResponse.description: Response object for updating ticket preference

ticket_id.description: ID of the ticket to transfer

current_user_id.description: ID of the current ticket owner

new_user_id.description: ID of the new ticket owner

TransferTicketRequest.description: Request object for transferring a ticket

new_user_id.description: ID of the new ticket owner

ReleaseTicketRequest.description: Request object for releasing reserved tickets

message.description: Message describing the result of the operation

ReleaseTicketResponse.description: Response object for ticket release operation

message.example: Invalid reservation ID or no reserved tickets found

ReleaseTicketResponseError.description: Response object for ticket release operation

ticket_id.description: ID of the ticket to mark as transferring

MarkTransferringRequest.description: Request object for marking ticket as transferring

ticket_id.description: ID of the ticket marked as transferring

MarkTransferringResponse.description: Response object for marking ticket as transferring

ConfirmTicketRequest.description: Request object for confirming ticket purchase

message.example: Invalid reservation ID or no reserved tickets found

reservationId.description: ID of the reservation to confirm

userId.description: ID of the user to confirm

ticketId.description: ID of the ticket to confirm

ConfirmTicketSplitRequest.description: Request object for confirming ticket split

message.example: Ticket purchase confirmed for user ID: 1001

ConfirmTicketSplitRequestResponse.description: Response object for confirming ticket split

ticketList.description: List of ticket IDs to cancel

items.description: List of ticket IDs to cancel

eventId.description: ID of the event this ticket is for

tickets.description: List of tickets with their details

additionalProperties.description: List of tickets with their details

items.description: List of tickets with their details

totalCount.description: Total number of tickets for this event

additionalProperties.description: Count of tickets grouped by their status

statusCounts.description: Count of tickets grouped by their status

TicketResponse.description: Response object containing ticket information and statistics for an event

TicketAssociatedUserResponse.description: Response object for ticket associated user
